description:
Solution for version-controlling the database schemas and data 

dbForge Source Control is an add-in for SSMS designed to configure and simplify all tasks related to version control of databases. It covers the static data and database schemas. Users can commit, track, and roll back changes, view and resolve conflicts, and automate the database development tasks in both dedicated and shared work models.

By applying the Source Controls for SQL Server, you can add this functionality to SSMS and perform all the necessary tasks without leaving your favored IDE. The solution is compatible with all popular systems of version control, including Git (including GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, Azure DevOps), SVN, TFVC, and other version controls. 

You can test the functionality of this tool properly, as the free trial is available.
displayName: dbForge Source Control for SQL Server
summary: Solution for version-controlling the database schemas and data
author: Devart
